Reviews.Title: Small size...Big features
Reviews.Author: Rosalie Mehrab "hamburgerologist"
Reviews.Content: I have a full size digital SLR camera but I just wanted something I could throw in my backpack to have with me always. This camera has a lot of the features that my DSLR has and much more than my cell phone camera has. The quality of the photos are really good. Sorry but I haven't used the video function of the camera yet. If you are looking for an inexpensive, full featured, easy to take along camera, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Worth every Penny!
Reviews.Author: homesweethome57
Reviews.Content: My sister just got married, and wanted to make it low budget.  Instead of buying a Rebel or Nikon DSLR, she said "16MP will take good pictures!"  I told her she was crazy, but I have to say that I was really impressed by some of the shots she took.  Will this ever stand up to a high level camera? OF COURSE NOT! Apples and oranges.  But - this camera holds its own in this class and is phenomenal at sub $169.99

Reviews.Title: A Great Deal
Reviews.Author: joseph roger porter
Reviews.Content: Direct Deals came through for me. The Panasonic DMC-FH7K camera was just as specified. It's amazing how 21st Century tech can be packaged in such a smallcamera. Everything was in order and top-notch. If the need arises I would order again! Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Excelent camera!
Reviews.Author: Maria Eugenia Reyes
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to work and take pictures son beautiful. If you aren't a photographer this camera does the work instead of you.Is really excelent!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Little Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: kauf2947
Reviews.Content: This camera is small, light weight and easy to use. While I am walking through New York City or running in the Adirondack mountains I enjoy taking pictures. The quality is excellent and a 3GB memory card can hold more than enough pictures. The price of $100 is exceptional and the size makes it very easy to place it in my pants pocket for that quick picture. I highly recommend the Panasonic DMC-FH7 Lumix.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Sergio
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied about it, is cheap and his features are excellent. the best option in the market for a hundred dollars!

ProductInfo.Features:
3-inch Smart Touch Screen, enabling Touch Auto Focus (AF), Touch Zoom, Touch Shutter and Intelligent Scene Selector
28mm wide-angle LEICA DC lens with an impressive 4x optical image stabilized zoom
iA (Intelligent Auto) mode, making it easy for anyone to take great photos
Beauty retouch mode
Intelligent Scene Selector automatically selects the best option from: Macro, Portrait, Scenery, Night Portrait, Night Scenery and Sunset
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic DMC-FH7K 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom Touchscreen - Black
